backFields.label: üèóÔ∏è Q4 Infrastructure Achievements
backFields.value:
Your City Infrastructure priority funded two transformative projects improving mobility and green space in downtown Frederick!

Total LIFT Contribution: $46,900
Your Share: ~$1,286 (34% of certificate)

These projects make our city more livable, sustainable, and connected.

backFields.label: Project 1: Downtown Protected Bike Lanes
backFields.value:
Route: Market Street Corridor
Length: 1.2 miles
Status: ‚úì Complete October 2025

Features:
‚Ä¢ Protected bike lanes (both directions)
‚Ä¢ 8 new bike parking corrals
‚Ä¢ Green-painted intersections
‚Ä¢ LED street lighting
‚Ä¢ ADA-compliant curb cuts

Impact:
‚Ä¢ Daily cyclists: 320+ (up from 80)
‚Ä¢ 400% increase in bike commuting
‚Ä¢ Reduced car trips: ~500/day
‚Ä¢ Carbon savings: 12 tons/year
‚Ä¢ Zero bike accidents since opening

"I can finally bike safely to work with my kids to daycare. This changed our daily routine!" - Parent commuter

Your funding helped make Frederick a bike-friendly city!

backFields.label: Project 2: Pocket Park Restoration
backFields.value:
Location: Corner of Church & Market
Size: 0.5 acres
Status: ‚úì Reopened November 2025

Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Native plantings (pollinator garden)
‚Ä¢ Stormwater bioswales
‚Ä¢ Accessible pathways
‚Ä¢ Community gathering space
‚Ä¢ Public art installation
‚Ä¢ Free WiFi

Impact:
‚Ä¢ Daily visitors: 530+ people
‚Ä¢ Stormwater captured: 50,000 gal/year
‚Ä¢ Native plants: 2,400+ installed
‚Ä¢ Pollinator species: 47 documented
‚Ä¢ Community events hosted: 12/year

This forgotten corner is now a vibrant community hub and environmental asset!

backFields.label: üìä Funding Leverage Success
backFields.value:
Your pooled LIFT contribution unlocked major public funding:

Total Project Costs: $620,000
‚Ä¢ Bike lanes: $480,000
‚Ä¢ Pocket park: $140,000

Funding Sources:
‚Ä¢ LIFT Pool: $46,900 (7.6%)
‚Ä¢ State Transportation Grant: $350,000
‚Ä¢ City Capital Budget: $150,000
‚Ä¢ Private Donations: $73,100

Your $1,286 leveraged $12,950 in public/private funding - a 10:1 ratio!

LIFT's early commitment gave the city confidence to pursue state grants.

backFields.label: üö¥ Guided Infrastructure Tour
backFields.value:

locations.relevantText: You're on Market Street! Check out the new protected bike lanes your City Infrastructure priority helped fund.
